snippet: The British telecommunications giant Vodafone said Tuesday that it had started legal proceedings against the Indian government over a proposed retroactive tax law that could cost the company more than $2 billion.
abstract: The British telecommunications giant Vodafone said Tuesday that it had started legal proceedings against the Indian government over a proposed retroactive tax law that could cost the company more than $2 billion.

headline.main: Vodafone Takes Legal Action Over Tax Proposal in India
